prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, trained in Bluff or Thievery
name: Phantasmagoric Scoundrel
text: For some scoundrels, the ability to convince and deceive by using language is insufficient. They want to fool the eyes, not just the ears; they want to find far more reliable means of tricking those who would stand against them.

features.blindingAction(11thLevel): When you use an encounter or daily power to hit a target that grants combat advantage to you, you can spend an action point to blind the target until the end of your next turn
features.combatIllusionist(11thLevel): You gain one arcane illusion encounter attack power of 7th level or lower from any class of your choice
features.expertPhantasmagorist(11thLevel): You can master and perform rituals of the deception category as though you had the Ritual Caster feat
features.illusoryCommunication(16thLevel): Once per encounter before you make a Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate check, you can choose to roll an Arcana check also
features.masterPhantasmagorist(16thLevel): One additional time each day, you can perform a deception ritual of your level or lower without spending the component cost (though you must still use any focus required by the ritual)
